author: ryanleeschneider
content: I also suspect that tracking multiple "heads" in, say, the subscription subsystems of ELs will be a non-trivial change on most clients, so sooner this gets firmed up the better.

author: djrtwo
content:
Heads up! Kurtosis will be leading a breakout room on using their software to test the merge ***this Friday at 14 UTC***

Some client teams have already found their automation/simulation tools useful in debugging problems and even getting some tests into their CI. Would be great to have some of the testing folks from each team drop in to learn more

https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/482
